DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Radiation Therapy Anatomic Site java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:Named locations of or within the body._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.
